### FragmentOfVar {#a99465c73822000c554d2a9dcf3344215}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using LiveDebugValues::FragmentOfVar = 
    std::pair&lt;const DILocalVariable &#42;, DIExpression::FragmentInfo&gt;</>}>
Types for recording sets of variable fragments that overlap.

For a given local variable, we record all other fragments of that variable that could overlap it, to reduce search time.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-h/#l01027">1027</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-h">InstrRefBasedImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
